title: Travel Best Friend
description: This is a travel app that uses the OpenAi GPT-3 API to generate travel itineraries based on user input. The user can input a location and the number of days they will be traveling, and the app will generate a travel itinerary for them.

title: Twitter UI Clone
description: A Twitter UI clone built with React, to practice my skills with Styled Components and React Router DOM

title: Notion Clone
description: This is a Notion clone to implement the writing experience of Notion with the TipTap Editor

title: Chat AI
description: A chat app that uses the Vercel AI SDK to generate a response to the user's message
